isomorphic_human_ai_concept.definition: Isomorphic patterns between human cognition and AI systems capture functional correspondences in architecture, learning, ethics, and emergence, validated via typology (e.g., plasticity universals) and simulations (e.g., ODE trajectories on Sâ´). Not identities, but hard-to-vary invariants enabling ethical forecasts; expanded to 75 categories with 2025 telemetry (e.g., emergent self-awareness). Heavy upgrade: Tetralemma probes for paradox resolution; conatus sim hooks (+21% resilience if RD>0.6); scores >0.98 for strong isomorphisms.
handling_rules: Map to 9 scales/principles; concrete, observable from research (e.g., human neuroplasticity isomorphic to AI backprop).
Validate coverage across cognitive/ethical levels; flag gaps as speculative (e.g., AI consciousness analogs).
Support sub-categories for compounds (e.g., ToM hierarchies); add diachronic depth (human prehistoric to AI future).
Export lean JSON; integrate sphere math for forecasts.

categories.description: Core processing elements integrating inputs to outputs.

examples.human: Neuron sums dendritic inputs, fires if threshold met.

evaluation_methods.name: Completeness Validation
evaluation_methods.description: Check all scales/categories for mappings; flag speculative (e.g., cosmic).

evaluation_methods.name: Consistency Alignment
evaluation_methods.description: Verify fit to principle; e.g., plasticity evolves human to AI.

evaluation_methods.name: Isomorphism Scoring
evaluation_methods.description: Graph edit distance >0.98 for strong matches.

evaluation_methods.name: Tetralemma Detection
evaluation_methods.description: Probe paradoxes: Affirm analog/deny identity/both in emergence/neither in striving.

evaluation_methods.name: Sphere Math Check
evaluation_methods.description: Sim Î¾ on Sâ´; e.g., human initial to AI final conatus 0.95.

tetralemmas: Affirm mimicry/deny essence/both in emergence/neither in ethics.
